ques: Find Refund Policy in ryanair's help.
Look for a one-way flight on 17 September 2024 from Dublin to Athens.
On ryanair website, enter Shanghai in the destination textbox, does ryanair offer this destination?

What else can be booked on ryanair website apart from booking flight tickets.
Scroll down through enterprise's homepage, switch off the cookie pop-up (if any) and list the 3 types of car  rental that the site supports?

Search for Bangkok International Airport in enterprise, selecting the period from 24 September to 28 September, then click on the Browser Vehicle button below to see the results of your search that match your criteria. Close all pop-ups that appear during this process.
Find the FAQs in enterprise's Help section, list 3 Topics.
Enter Los Angeles in the search box of enterprise and what airport related locations are available.
Browse the enterprise homepage to see if there are currently any deals?
Search Agoda for hotels in Pattaya for stays from October 2 to October 5, 2024, 1 room, and sort the results by "Top-reviewed".
Search for one-way flights on Agoda Flights section, from Shanghai (PVG) to Tokyo (NRT), departing on September 28, 2024.
Search for events held in Seoul on agoda's Activities section. Do any of them have a score greater than 4.8 stars?
Browse agoda's homepage to see if there are any deals related to hotels?
Search for pickup from Suvarnabhumi Airport to Central World on 20 October at 12pm on agoda.
Allow All cookies when opening Amtrak. Then browse the home page and tell me what ads are currently shown?
Search on the Amtrak home page (close the cookie pop-up), 'From' is NYC, 'To' is WAS, departure 25 October 2024, one way (leave return date blank). Answer the search results.
Go to Amtrak webpage (allow all cookies) and click on Rail Passes on Amtrak to see what is available.
On the Amtrak home page allow all cookies, close all the pop-ups, then click traveller to see what types of passengers can be added.
On Amtrak, look for the Chicago to Los Angeles train, round-trip, 10 Oct 2024 - 15 Oct 2024. (Close any pop-ups that appear during this process)

Find the relevant contact information of the MBTA website from the menu and answer it.

Find the trip planner on mbta's homepage and look up the route from Boston College to Castle Island. Answer one of them.

Find the menu on the thetrainline website, click on the help section, and list 3 help topics you see.
Search for a train from Birmingham New Street to Peterborough on thetrainline, for September 28, 2024.

Regarding time selection on thetrainline, click on the text box to select the Out time, choose September 17, 15:45 from the calendar, and click on the text box again to close the calendar after selection.
When searching for a train on thetrainline, add a Youth passenger aged 12.
Scroll down on the thetrainline homepage to learn about its advantages and summarize 2 points.
Search for one-way tickets on us.megabus from Burlington to Montpelier, choose any available date in September, for example, September 22, 2024.
Click on the 'Track my bus' option in the check my bus section on us.megabus, enter 'Alanson, MI' in the 'From' textbox and search for buses available for tracking.
Find and open the Fare Finder tool on the us.megabus website and briefly describe its purpose.

In the help section of us.megabus, look for help info related to 'refund'.
Search for Stays on Airbnb, location Santa Clarita, check-in date September 30, check-out date October 2, then click search and respond with the first result found.
Browse the icons on the Airbnb homepage, locate and click on 'ski-in/out', find a Guest favorite place, and view its price per night.
Find the help center in the Airbnb menu, then search for 'cancellation policy for a confirmed reservation' and locate the answer.
Search for rooms on Airbnb in Abiquiu from October 10 to October 15, 2024, and set the Type of place filter in the results page to 'Room'.
In the icon tab on the airbnb homepage, is there any content that is already sold out?
Scroll down on the Koa homepage to get a brief understanding of the website's purpose and the benefits of camping.
Search for Marietta on Koa to see what campgrounds are available for selection. In the list view, list out the 3 closest stays.

Search for campgrounds in Rainbow City with a check-in date of 10/21/2024 and a check-out date of 10/23/2024. Please firstly select the dates on the Koa homepage and then input the location. Then, check the closest results.
Search for campgrounds in Springfield on Koa. On the results page, what filters are available for selection?
Click on 'KOA AI CHAT' on the Koa homepage. Skip through a series of instructions, enter your name as WebVoyager, and then click on a website recommendation question to ask the AI and view the reply.

In the Help section of the Marriott website, search for 'How Do I Access My Hotel Bill?' and summarize the answer provided on the webpage.
Browse the Marriott homepage to find the benefits of becoming a Marriott Bonvoy Member.
Click on the Vacations section on the Marriott website's homepage and look for Travel Tips & Ideas. List two article titles that appear on the webpage.

Complete the following steps: Enter 'New York' in the search box on Marriott, select 'New York Marriott Marquis' from the options that appear, then open the calendar and click on October 1st and October 3rd respectively, and click 'done'.
Check out the Top Deals page on Target to see what categories of items have deals, list 3 categories.

Change the shipping location in the homepage to 90010.
In Target's ‘Shop Order Pickup’, set the in-store pick up location to the store closest to 90384.
